description:
Welcome onboard an incredible Luxury Train through some of the most spectacular landscapes in the USA. This is 2 Days on the Rocky Mountaineer's new Rockies to Red Rocks route in the United States!

If youâ€™re thinking of taking an unforgettable train journey, watch this first! With its unmatched scenery, the Rocky Mountaineerâ€™s Rockies to Red Rocks luxury train should find its way onto your bucket list. 

Even though Rocky Mountaineer has been around since the 1990â€™s, this is their first Luxury Train in the United States! 

In this video, weâ€™ll travel from Denver from Moab, Utah and Arches National Park onboard this incredible Luxury Train in their premium Rocky Mountaineer Silverleaf Plus class of service. Youâ€™ll see the Luxury Train features available on this train along with the Luxury Train Food! Weâ€™ll also take in some of the incredible sights on this Luxury Train trip. 

Youâ€™ll see the sights, the food, and gain insight into what itâ€™s like to travel on the newest Luxury Train in the United States: Rocky Mountaineerâ€™s Rockies to Red Rocks.
